trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: Syntax

trans-unit.source: Syntax "index => values", separated by commas, define index and values. index may be of type string or integer. When index is omitted, an integer index is automatically generated, starting at 0. If index is an integer, next generated index will be the biggest integer index + 1. Note that when two identical index are defined, the last overwrite the first.
trans-unit.target: 语法“索引=>值”，以逗号分隔，定义索引和值。index的类型可以是字符串或整数。如果省略index，则会自动生成一个从0开始的整数索引。如果index是整数，则下一个生成的索引将是最大的整数索引+1。请注意，当定义了两个相同的索引时，最后一个将覆盖第一个。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to the reference-counting system being part of Zend Engine, a resource with no more references to it is detected automatically, and it is freed by the garbage collector. For this reason, it is rarely necessary to free the memory manually.
trans-unit.target: 由于引用计数系统是Zend Engine的一部分，因此可以自动检测到没有更多引用的资源，并由垃圾回收器将其释放。因此，很少需要手动释放内存。

trans-unit.source: That is, after instanciating an EvTimer with an after value of 5.0 and repeat value of 7.0 , remaining returns 5.0 . When the timer is started and one second passes, remaining will return 4.0 . When the timer expires and is restarted, it will return roughly 7.0 (likely slightly less as callback invocation takes some time too), and so on.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，在使用 after 值 5.0 和 repeat 值 7.0 初始化EvTimer 之后， remaining 返回 5.0 。当计时器启动并经过一秒钟时， remaining 将返回 4.0 。当计时器到期并重新启动时，它将返回大约 7.0 （由于回调调用也需要一些时间，因此返回的时间可能略短），依此类推。

trans-unit.source: That means that calling an anonymous function which has been assigned to a property is not directly possible. Instead the property has to be assigned to a variable first, for instance. As of PHP 7.0.0 it is possible to call such a property directly by enclosing it in parentheses.

trans-unit.source: The "one-line" comment styles only comment to the end of the line or the current block of PHP code, whichever comes first. This means that HTML code after // ... ?> or # ... ?> WILL be printed: ?> breaks out of PHP mode and returns to HTML mode, and // or # cannot influence that. If the asp_tags configuration directive is enabled, it behaves the same with // %> and # %>. However, the </script> tag doesn't break out of PHP mode in a one-line comment.
trans-unit.target: “单行”注释样式仅注释到该行的末尾或当前PHP代码块，以先到者为准。这意味着将打印// // ...？>或＃...？>之后的HTML代码：？>脱离PHP模式并返回HTML模式，// //或＃不会影响它。如果启用了asp_tags配置指令，则// //％>和＃％>的行为相同。但是，</ script>标记不会在单行注释中脱离PHP模式。

trans-unit.source: The "q", "Q", "J" and "P" codes were added to enable working with 64-bit numbers.
trans-unit.target: 增加了 "q"、"Q"、"J "和 "P "代码,以便能够处理64位数字。

trans-unit.source: The "whitespace" characters are HT (9), LF (10), FF (12), CR (13), and space (32). However, if locale-specific matching is happening, characters with code points in the range 128-255 may also be considered as whitespace characters, for instance, NBSP (A0).
trans-unit.target: 空格 "字符是HT(9)、LF(10)、FF(12)、CR(13)和空格(32)。但是,如果发生局部特定的匹配,代码点在128-255范围内的字符也可以被视为空白字符,例如,NBSP(A0)。

trans-unit.source: The "write" handler is not executed until after the output stream is closed. Thus, output from debugging statements in the "write" handler will never be seen in the browser. If debugging output is necessary, it is suggested that the debug output be written to a file instead.
trans-unit.target: 写 "处理程序直到输出流关闭后才会被执行。因此,在 "写 "处理程序中的调试语句的输出永远不会在浏览器中看到。如果调试输出是必要的,建议将调试输出写入文件。

trans-unit.source: The “bound object” determines the value $this will have in the function body and the “class scope” represents a class which determines which private and protected members the anonymous function will be able to access. Namely, the members that will be visible are the same as if the anonymous function were a method of the class given as value of the newscope parameter.
trans-unit.target: “绑定对象”确定函数主体中$ this的值，“类范围”表示一个类，该类确定匿名函数将访问哪些私有成员和受保护成员。即，将可见的成员与匿名函数是作为 newscope 参数值给出的类的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: The 'variant' and 'private' subtags can take maximum 15 values whereas 'extlang' can take maximum 3 values.e.g. Variants are allowed with the suffix ranging from 0-14. In the returned locale id, the subtag is ordered by suffix resulting in variant0 followed by variant1 followed by variant2 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 'variant'和'private'子标签最多可以取15个值,而'extlang'最多可以取3个值,例如:Variants允许使用0-14的后缀。因此,输入数组的键可以是variant0,variant1,...,variant14。在返回的locale id中,子标签按后缀排序,结果是variant0,接着是variant1,然后是variant2,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The » ICU Collation Service supports many levels of comparison (named "Levels", but also known as "Strengths"). Having these categories enables ICU to sort strings precisely according to local conventions. However, by allowing the levels to be selectively employed, searching for a string in text can be performed with various matching conditions.
trans-unit.target: 该»ICU整理服务支持比较多的水平（命名为‘级别’，也被称为‘优势’）。拥有这些类别使ICU可以根据本地约定精确地对字符串进行排序。但是，通过允许有选择地使用级别，可以在各种匹配条件下执行文本中的字符串搜索。

trans-unit.source: The string in PHP is implemented as an array of bytes and an integer indicating the length of the buffer. It has no information about how those bytes translate to characters, leaving that task to the programmer. There are no limitations on the values the string can be composed of; in particular, bytes with value 0 (“NUL bytes”) are allowed anywhere in the string (however, a few functions, said in this manual not to be “binary safe”, may hand off the strings to libraries that ignore data after a NUL byte.)
trans-unit.target: PHP中的字符串实现为字节数组和表示缓冲区长度的整数。它没有有关这些字节如何转换为字符的信息，该任务留给了程序员。字符串可以组成的值没有限制；特别是，允许在字符串的任何位置使用值为0的字节（“ NUL字节”）（但是，本手册中所说的一些函数不是“二进制安全”的）可能会将字符串传递给忽略字符串的库。 NUL字节。）

trans-unit.source: The additional_parameters parameter can be used to pass additional flags as command line options to the program configured to be used when sending mail, as defined by the sendmail_path configuration setting. For example, this can be used to set the envelope sender address when using sendmail with the -f sendmail option.

trans-unit.source: The address parameter is either an IPv4 address in dotted-quad notation (e.g. 127.0.0.1) if socket is AF_INET, a valid IPv6 address (e.g. ::1) if IPv6 support is enabled and socket is AF_INET6 or the pathname of a Unix domain socket, if the socket family is AF_UNIX.
trans-unit.target: 的 address 参数是在点分表示法表示的IPv4地址（例如127.0.0.1）如果 socket 是 AF_INET ，有效的IPv6地址（例如:: 1）如果启用IPv6支持和 socket 是 AF_INET6 或Unix域的路径名套接字（如果套接字系列为 AF_UNIX )。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm_directory parameter is used to locate the encryption module. When you supply a directory name, it is used. When you set it to an empty string (""), the value set by the mcrypt.algorithms_dirphp.ini directive is used. When it is not set, the default directory that is used is the one that was compiled into libmcrypt (usually /usr/local/lib/libmcrypt).
trans-unit.target: 所述 algorithm_directory 参数被用来定位加密模块。提供目录名时，将使用它。将其设置为空字符串（“”）时，将使用mcrypt.algorithms_dir php.ini 指令设置的值。如果未设置，则使用的默认目录是编译到libmcrypt中的目录（通常是 /usr/local/lib/libmcrypt ）。

trans-unit.source: The connection_string can be empty to use all default parameters, or it can contain one or more parameter settings separated by whitespace. Each parameter setting is in the form keyword = value. Spaces around the equal sign are optional. To write an empty value or a value containing spaces, surround it with single quotes, e.g., keyword = 'a value'. Single quotes and backslashes within the value must be escaped with a backslash, i.e., \' and \\.
trans-unit.target: 该 connection_string 可以是空的使用所有默认参数，也可以包含一个或多个参数设置分离的空白。每个参数设置都采用关键字= value的形式。等号周围的空格是可选的。要写入空值或包含空格的值，请用单引号将其括起来，例如keyword ='a value'。值内的单引号和反斜杠必须使用反斜杠转义，即\'和\\。

trans-unit.source: The database argument has to be a valid path to database file on the server it resides on. If the server is not local, it must be prefixed with either 'hostname:' (TCP/IP), '//hostname/' (NetBEUI) or 'hostname@' (IPX/SPX), depending on the connection protocol used.

If the server is not local, it must be prefixed with either 'hostname:' (TCP/IP), 'hostname/port:' (TCP/IP with interbase server on custom TCP port), '//hostname/' (NetBEUI), depending on the connection protocol used.

trans-unit.source: The flags parameter can be used to specify additional options for Memcached::getMulti(). Memcached::GET_PRESERVE_ORDER ensures that the keys are returned in the same order as they were requested in. Memcached::GET_EXTENDED ensures that the CAS tokens will be fetched too.

trans-unit.source: The flags parameter is a bitmask that controls the operations that can be performed on the output buffer. The default is to allow output buffers to be cleaned, flushed and removed, which can be set explicitly via PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_CLEANABLE | PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_FLUSHABLE | PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_REMOVABLE, or PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_STDFLAGS as shorthand.
trans-unit.target: 的 flags 参数是一个位掩码，其控制可在输出缓冲器上执行的操作。默认设置是允许清除，刷新和删除输出缓冲区，可以通过 PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_CLEANABLE | PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_FLUSHABLE | PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_REMOVABLE 或 PHP_OUTPUT_HANDLER_STDFLAGS 作为简写。

trans-unit.source: The format string consists of format codes followed by an optional repeater argument. The repeater argument can be either an integer value or * for repeating to the end of the input data. For a, A, h, H the repeat count specifies how many characters of one data argument are taken, for @ it is the absolute position where to put the next data, for everything else the repeat count specifies how many data arguments are consumed and packed into the resulting binary string.
trans-unit.target: 该 format 串由格式代码接着任选的中继器的参数。Repeater参数可以是整数值，也可以是*，用于重复到输入数据的末尾。对于a，A，h，H，重复计数指定采用一个数据参数的多少个字符，因为@是放置下一个数据的绝对位置，对于其他所有内容，重复计数指定消耗了多少数据参数，打包到结果二进制字符串中。

trans-unit.source: The mode parameter consists of three octal number components specifying access restrictions for the owner, the user group in which the owner is in, and to everybody else in this order. One component can be computed by adding up the needed permissions for that target user base. Number 1 means that you grant execute rights, number 2 means that you make the file writeable, number 4 means that you make the file readable. Add up these numbers to specify needed rights. You can also read more about modes on Unix systems with 'man 1 chmod' and 'man 2 chmod'.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mode 参数包含三个八进制数部件指定用于所述所有者的访问限制的，用户组，其中所述所有者是在，以及其他人在这个顺序。可以通过将目标用户群所需的权限相加来计算一个组件。数字1表示您授予执行权限，数字2表示您使文件可写，数字4表示您使文件可读。将这些数字加起来以指定所需的权限。您还可以阅读有关带' man 1 chmod '和' man 2 chmod '的Unix系统上模式的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The mode_directory parameter is used to locate the encryption module. When you supply a directory name, it is used. When you set it to an empty string (""), the value set by the mcrypt.modes_dirphp.ini directive is used. When it is not set, the default directory that is used is the one that was compiled-in into libmcrypt (usually /usr/local/lib/libmcrypt).
trans-unit.target: 所述 mode_directory 参数被用来定位加密模块。提供目录名时，将使用它。将其设置为空字符串（“”）时，将使用mcrypt.modes_dir php.ini 指令设置的值。如果未设置，则使用的默认目录是被编译到libmcrypt中的目录（通常是 /usr/local/lib/libmcrypt ）。

trans-unit.source: The tv_sec and tv_usec together form the timeout parameter, tv_sec specifies the number of seconds while tv_usec the number of microseconds. The timeout is an upper bound on the amount of time that stream_select() will wait before it returns. If tv_sec and tv_usec are both set to 0, stream_select() will not wait for data - instead it will return immediately, indicating the current status of the streams.
trans-unit.target: 的 tv_sec 和 tv_usec 一起形成超时参数， tv_sec 指定的秒数而 tv_usec 微秒数。该 timeout 是上界的时间量stream_select（）将等待它返回之前。如果 tv_sec 和 tv_usec 都设置为0，stream_select（）将不等待数据-而是立即返回，指示流的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The tv_sec and tv_usec together form the timeout parameter. The timeout is an upper bound on the amount of time elapsed before socket_select() return. tv_sec may be zero , causing socket_select() to return immediately. This is useful for polling. If tv_sec is NULL (no timeout), socket_select() can block indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 的 tv_sec 和 tv_usec 一起形成超时参数。该超时是前一个上的时间量上限经过socket_select（）返回。 tv_sec 可能为零，导致socket_select（）立即返回。这对于轮询很有用。如果 tv_sec 为 NULL （无超时），则socket_select（）可以无限期阻塞。

trans-unit.source: The + operator returns the right-hand array appended to the left-hand array; for keys that exist in both arrays, the elements from the left-hand array will be used, and the matching elements from the right-hand array will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 的+运算符返回附加到左手阵列右手阵列; 对于两个数组中都存在的键，将使用左侧数组中的元素，而右侧数组中的匹配元素将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The - character is now quoted
trans-unit.target: 本-字符目前商家报价

trans-unit.source: The /e modifier is deprecated. Use preg_replace_callback() instead. See the PREG_REPLACE_EVAL documentation for additional information about security risks.
trans-unit.target: 该/ E修改已被弃用。请改用preg_replace_callback（）。有关安全风险的其他信息，请参见PREG_REPLACE_EVAL文档。

trans-unit.source: The CURLOPT_XXX option to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的CURLOPT_XXX选项。

trans-unit.source: The F and f format characters were added.
trans-unit.target: 该˚F和˚F添加格式字符。

trans-unit.source: The TZ environment variable is no longer used to guess the timezone.
trans-unit.target: 该TZ环境变量不再使用猜测时区。

trans-unit.source: The \A, \Z, and \z assertions differ from the traditional circumflex and dollar (described in anchors ) in that they only ever match at the very start and end of the subject string, whatever options are set. They are not affected by the PCRE_MULTILINE or PCRE_DOLLAR_ENDONLY options. The difference between \Z and \z is that \Z matches before a newline that is the last character of the string as well as at the end of the string, whereas \z matches only at the end.
trans-unit.target: 该\ A，\ Z ^和\ž断言与传统的音调和美元（描述不同的锚，它们仅匹配在起步和目标字符串，任何选项都设置结束）。它们不受PCRE_MULTILINE或PCRE_DOLLAR_ENDONLY选项的影响。之间的差\Ž和\Ž是\ž换行符，其在所述串的结束字符串的以及最后一个字符，而在此之前的比赛\Ž仅在端部相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The \G assertion is true only when the current matching position is at the start point of the match, as specified by the offset argument of preg_match(). It differs from \A when the value of offset is non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 所述\ G变仅在当前匹配位置是在比赛开始点断言是真实的，由指定的 offset 的参数的preg_match（） 。当 offset 的值非零时，它不同于\ A。

trans-unit.source: The \X escape matches a Unicode extended grapheme cluster. An extended grapheme cluster is one or more Unicode characters that combine to form a single glyph. In effect, this can be thought of as the Unicode equivalent of . as it will match one composed character, regardless of how many individual characters are actually used to render it.
trans-unit.target: 该\ X转义匹配一个Unicode扩展字形集群。扩展字素簇是一个或多个Unicode字符，它们组合形成一个字形。实际上，可以将其视为的Unicode等效项。因为它将匹配一个组成的字符，而不管实际使用了多少个单独的字符来呈现它。

trans-unit.source: The addChild method returns a SimpleXMLElement object representing the child added to the XML node.
trans-unit.target: 所述的addChild方法返回的SimpleXMLElement表示添加到XML节点的子对象。

trans-unit.source: The allowed_classes element of options) is now strictly typed, i.e. if anything other than an array or a boolean is given, unserialize() returns FALSE and issues an E_WARNING.
trans-unit.target: 现在已严格类型化 options 的allowed_classes元素，即，如果给出除数组或布尔值以外的任何内容，unserialize（）将返回 FALSE 并发出 E_WARNING 。

trans-unit.source: The asXML method formats the parent object's data in XML version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 该asXML方法在XML 1.0版格式父对象的数据。

trans-unit.source: The c type specifier ignores padding and width
trans-unit.target: 所述Ç类型说明符忽略填充和宽度

trans-unit.source: The cache_wsdl option is one of WSDL_CACHE_NONE, WSDL_CACHE_DISK, WSDL_CACHE_MEMORY or WSDL_CACHE_BOTH.
trans-unit.target: 该cache_wsdl选项之一 WSDL_CACHE_NONE ， WSDL_CACHE_DISK ， WSDL_CACHE_MEMORY 或 WSDL_CACHE_BOTH 。

trans-unit.source: The classmap option can be used to map some WSDL types to PHP classes. This option must be an array with WSDL types as keys and names of PHP classes as values.
trans-unit.target: 将类映射选项可以用来绘制一些WSDL类型的PHP类。此选项必须是一个数组，其中WSDL类型为键，而PHP类的名称为值。

trans-unit.source: The compression option allows to use compression of HTTP SOAP requests and responses.
trans-unit.target: 该压缩选项允许使用HTTP的SOAP请求和响应的压缩。

trans-unit.source: The connection_timeout option defines a timeout in seconds for the connection to the SOAP service. This option does not define a timeout for services with slow responses. To limit the time to wait for calls to finish the default_socket_timeout setting is available.
trans-unit.target: 该connection_timeout选项定义超时以秒为单位的连接到SOAP服务。此选项不会为响应缓慢的服务定义超时。要限制等待呼叫完成的时间，可以使用default_socket_timeout设置。

trans-unit.source: The cookies value simply means that the browser itself is capable of accepting cookies and does not mean the user has enabled the browser to accept cookies or not. The only way to test if cookies are accepted is to set one with setcookie(), reload, and check for the value.
trans-unit.target: 该饼干的价值只是意味着浏览器本身能够接受的饼干并不意味着用户已启用浏览器接受cookies与否。测试cookie是否被接受的唯一方法是使用setcookie（）设置一个，重新加载并检查该值。

trans-unit.target: 该声明结构也可在全球范围内使用，影响到其后的（但是如果与文件中的所有代码申报被列入那么它不会影响到父文件）。

trans-unit.target: 在默认的事件循环被自动初始化EV。可通过Ev类的方法或EvLoop :: defaultLoop（）方法进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The directive section allows the behavior of the declare block to be set. Currently only three directives are recognized: the ticks directive (See below for more information on the ticks directive), the encoding directive (See below for more information on the encoding directive) and the strict_types directive (See for more information the strict section on the Function arguments page)
trans-unit.target: 该指令部分允许的行为申报块进行设置。目前只有三个指令被认可：在蜱指令（请参阅下面的详细信息，在蜱指令），该编码指令（见下文的详细信息，编码指令）和strict_types指令（更多信息请参见该严格的节函数参数页面）

trans-unit.source: The e modifier has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 该ê修改已被弃用。

trans-unit.source: The else statement is only executed if the if expression evaluated to FALSE, and if there were any elseif expressions - only if they evaluated to FALSE as well (see elseif).
trans-unit.target: 在其他语句只执行，如果如果表达式评估为 FALSE ，如果有任何ELSEIF表述-只有当他们评估为 FALSE ，以及（见ELSEIF）。

trans-unit.source: The elseif statement is only executed if the preceding if expression and any preceding elseif expressions evaluated to FALSE, and the current elseif expression evaluated to TRUE.

trans-unit.target: 的编码选项定义内部的字符编码。此选项不会更改SOAP请求的编码（始终为utf-8），但会将字符串转换为该请求。

trans-unit.target: 该例外选项定义肥皂错误是否抛出类型的异常布尔值的SOAPFault。

trans-unit.target: 在全球关键字

trans-unit.source: The goto operator can be used to jump to another section in the program. The target point is specified by a label followed by a colon, and the instruction is given as goto followed by the desired target label. This is not a full unrestricted goto. The target label must be within the same file and context, meaning that you cannot jump out of a function or method, nor can you jump into one. You also cannot jump into any sort of loop or switch structure. You may jump out of these, and a common use is to use a goto in place of a multi-level break.
trans-unit.target: 将跳转操作符可以用来跳转到计划中的其他部分。目标点由标签和冒号指定，指令以goto给出，后跟所需的目标标签。这不是完全不受限制的goto。目标标签必须在同一文件和上下文中，这意味着您不能跳出一个函数或方法，也不能跳入一个函数或方法。您也不能跳入任何形式的循环或开关结构。您可能会跳过这些，通常的用法是使用goto代替多级中断。

trans-unit.source: The goto operator is available as of PHP 5.3.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.3开始，goto运算符可用。

trans-unit.source: The if construct is one of the most important features of many languages, PHP included. It allows for conditional execution of code fragments. PHP features an if structure that is similar to that of C:
trans-unit.target: 该如果结构是很多语言的最重要的特征之一，PHP包括在内。它允许有条件地执行代码片段。PHP具有类似于C 的if结构：

trans-unit.source: The include statement includes and evaluates the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 在包括语句包含并运行指定文件。

trans-unit.source: The include_once statement includes and evaluates the specified file during the execution of the script. This is a behavior similar to the include statement, with the only difference being that if the code from a file has already been included, it will not be included again, and include_once returns TRUE. As the name suggests, the file will be included just once.
trans-unit.target: 该include_once语句包括和脚本的执行过程中运行指定文件。这是一种与include语句相似的行为，唯一的区别是，如果已经包含了文件中的代码，则不会再次包含它，并且include_once返回 TRUE 。顾名思义，该文件将仅包含一次。

trans-unit.source: The instanceof operator was introduced in PHP 5. Before this time is_a() was used but is_a() has since been deprecated in favor of instanceof. Note that as of PHP 5.3.0, is_a() is no longer deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 该的instanceof运算符是PHP 5中引入此之前is_a（）被使用，但是is_a（）自赞成被否决的instanceof。请注意，自PHP 5.3.0起，不再弃用is_a（）。

trans-unit.source: The keep_alive option is a boolean value defining whether to send the Connection: Keep-Alive header or Connection: close.
trans-unit.target: 所述KEEP_ALIVE选项是定义是否发送一个布尔值连接：保持活动头或连接：关闭。

trans-unit.source: The location option is the URL of the remote Web service.

trans-unit.source: The require_once statement is identical to require except PHP will check if the file has already been included, and if so, not include (require) it again.
trans-unit.target: 该require_once语句是相同的要求，除了PHP会检查文件是否已经被包含，如果是这样，不包括（要求）再次。

trans-unit.source: The safe_mode_allowed_env_vars and safe_mode_protected_env_vars directives only take effect when safe_mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 将在safe_mode_allowed_env_vars和safe_mode_protected_env_vars指令时才生效的safe_mode启用。

trans-unit.source: The safe_mode_protected_env_vars directive contains a comma-delimited list of environment variables, that the end user won't be able to change using putenv(). These variables will be protected even if safe_mode_allowed_env_vars is set to allow to change them.
trans-unit.target: 该safe_mode_protected_env_vars指令包含有一个逗号分隔的环境变量的列表，最终用户将无法使用改变putenv（）函数。即使将safe_mode_allowed_env_vars设置为允许更改它们，这些变量也将受到保护。

trans-unit.source: The send_errors option can be set to FALSE to sent a generic error message ("Internal error") instead of the specific error message sent otherwise.

trans-unit.target: 所述soap_version选项应该是任一个 SOAP_1_1 或 SOAP_1_2 选择SOAP 1.1或1.2，分别。如果省略，则使用1.1。

trans-unit.source: The soapaction option is the action to call.

trans-unit.source: The space characters are HT (9), LF (10), VT (11), FF (12), CR (13), and space (32). Notice that this list includes the VT character (code 11). This makes "space" different to \s, which does not include VT (for Perl compatibility).
trans-unit.target: 的空间字符是HT（9），LF（10），VT（11），FF（12），CR（13），和空间（32）。请注意，此列表包括VT字符（代码11）。这使“空格”不同于\ s，后者不包括VT（出于Perl兼容性）。

trans-unit.target: 该ssl_method选项之一 SOAP_SSL_METHOD_TLS ， SOAP_SSL_METHOD_SSLv2 ， SOAP_SSL_METHOD_SSLv3 或 SOAP_SSL_METHOD_SSLv23 。

trans-unit.source: The switch statement is similar to a series of IF statements on the same expression. In many occasions, you may want to compare the same variable (or expression) with many different values, and execute a different piece of code depending on which value it equals to. This is exactly what the switch statement is for.
trans-unit.target: 该开关语句类似于一系列同一表达IF语句。在许多情况下，您可能希望将相同的变量（或表达式）与许多不同的值进行比较，并根据其等于哪个值来执行不同的代码。这正是switch语句的用途。

trans-unit.source: The APCIterator class makes it easier to iterate over large APC caches. This is helpful as it allows iterating over large caches in steps, while grabbing a defined number of entries per lock instance, so it frees the cache locks for other activities rather than hold up the entire cache to grab 100 (the default) entries. Also, using regular expression matching is more efficient as it's been moved to the C level.
trans-unit.target: 通过APCIterator类，可以更轻松地遍历大型APC缓存。这很有用，因为它允许分步遍历大型缓存，同时每个锁实例获取定义数量的条目，因此它释放了缓存锁用于其他活动，而不是占用整个缓存以获取100个（默认）条目。另外，使用正则表达式匹配会更有效，因为它已移至C级别。

trans-unit.source: The APCUIterator class makes it easier to iterate over large APCu caches. This is helpful as it allows iterating over large caches in steps, while grabbing a defined number of entries per lock instance, so it frees the cache locks for other activities rather than hold up the entire cache to grab 100 (the default) entries. Also, using regular expression matching is more efficient as it's been moved to the C level.
trans-unit.target: 该APCUIterator类更容易遍历大APCu缓存。这很有用，因为它允许分步遍历大型缓存，同时每个锁实例获取定义数量的条目，因此它释放了缓存锁以用于其他活动，而不是占用整个缓存以获取100个（默认）条目。另外，使用正则表达式匹配会更有效，因为它已移至C级别。

trans-unit.source: The Cond class has been removed in pthreads v3.
trans-unit.target: 该电导率类已经在并行线程V3被删除。

trans-unit.source: The DOMCdataSection inherits from DOMText for textural representation of CData constructs.
trans-unit.target: 该DOMCdataSection继承自一个DOMText为CData的结构的纹理表示。

trans-unit.source: The DOMImplementation interface provides a number of methods for performing operations that are independent of any particular instance of the document object model.

trans-unit.target: 在一个DOMText从类继承DOMCharacterData和表示的文本内容一个DOMElement或DOMAttr。

trans-unit.source: The DateInterval::format() method does not recalculate carry over points in time strings nor in date segments. This is expected because it is not possible to overflow values like "32 days" which could be interpreted as anything from "1 month and 4 days" to "1 month and 1 day".
trans-unit.target: 所述DateInterval ::格式（）方法执行超分不重新计算进位在时间字符串，也不是在时间段。这是可以预期的，因为不可能溢出诸如“ 32天”之类的值，该值可以解释为从“ 1个月4天”到“ 1个月1天”的任何值。

trans-unit.source: The Event::free() method currently doesn't destruct the object itself. To destruct the object completely call unset() , or assign NULL.
trans-unit.target: 该事件:: free（）的方法目前不破坏对象本身。要完全销毁该对象，请调用unset（）或分配 NULL 。

trans-unit.target: 该EventBase :: free（）的方法不破坏对象本身。要完全销毁该对象，请调用unset（）或分配 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The Volatile class is new to pthreads v3. Its introduction is a consequence of the new immutability semantics of Threaded members of Threaded classes. The Volatile class enables for mutability of its Threaded members, and is also used to store PHP arrays in Threaded contexts.
trans-unit.target: 该挥发性类是新的并行线程V3。它的引入是Threaded类的Threaded成员新的不变性语义的结果。的挥发性类使其的可变性螺纹构件，并且也用来存储PHP数组在螺纹上下文。

trans-unit.source: The addslashes() is sometimes incorrectly used to try to prevent SQL Injection. Instead, database-specific escaping functions and/or prepared statements should be used.
trans-unit.target: 在和addslashes（）有时被误用来尝试防止SQL注入。而是应使用特定于数据库的转义功能和/或准备好的语句。

trans-unit.source: The bindtextdomain() function sets the path for a domain.
trans-unit.target: 所述bindtextdomain（）函数设置为一个域的路径。

trans-unit.source: The current() function simply returns the value of the array element that's currently being pointed to by the internal pointer. It does not move the pointer in any way. If the internal pointer points beyond the end of the elements list or the array is empty, current() returns FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 的电流（）函数返回，因此目前正由内部指针指向的数组元素的值。它不会以任何方式移动指针。如果内部指针指向元素列表的末尾或数组为空，则current（）返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: The dgettext() function allows you to override the current domain for a single message lookup.
trans-unit.target: 所述dgettext（）函数可以覆盖当前 domain 为单个消息查找。

trans-unit.source: The dngettext() function allows you to override the current domain for a single plural message lookup.
trans-unit.target: 所述dngettext（）函数可以覆盖当前 domain 为单个复数消息查找。

trans-unit.source: The error_reporting() function sets the error_reporting directive at runtime. PHP has many levels of errors, using this function sets that level for the duration (runtime) of your script. If the optional level is not set, error_reporting() will just return the current error reporting level.
trans-unit.target: 在使用error_reporting（）函数将使用error_reporting在运行指令。PHP具有许多错误级别，使用此功能可以在脚本的持续时间（运行时）中设置该级别。如果未设置可选 level ，则error_reporting（）将仅返回当前的错误报告级别。

trans-unit.source: The eval() language construct is very dangerous because it allows execution of arbitrary PHP code. Its use thus is discouraged. If you have carefully verified that there is no other option than to use this construct, pay special attention not to pass any user provided data into it without properly validating it beforehand.
trans-unit.target: 该eval（）函数语言结构是非常危险的，因为它允许任意PHP代码执行。因此不鼓励使用它。如果您已经仔细验证了除了使用此构造方法外没有其他选择，请特别注意不要在未经适当验证的情况下将任何用户提供的数据传递到其中。

trans-unit.source: The filter() method must return one of three values upon completion.
trans-unit.target: 所述过滤器（）方法必须完成时返回三个值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The geoip_asnum_by_name() function will return the Autonomous System Numbers (ASN) associated with an IP address.
trans-unit.target: 该geoip_asnum_by_name（）函数会返回一个IP地址相关联的自治系统号码（ASN）。

trans-unit.source: The geoip_country_code3_by_name() function will return the three letter country code corresponding to a hostname or an IP address.

trans-unit.source: The geoip_country_code_by_name() function will return the two letter country code corresponding to a hostname or an IP address.

trans-unit.source: The geoip_country_name_by_name() function will return the full country name corresponding to a hostname or an IP address.

trans-unit.source: The geoip_database_info() function returns the corresponding GeoIP Database version as it is defined inside the binary file.
trans-unit.target: 所述geoip_database_info（） ，因为它是二进制文件内定义的函数返回相应GeoIP的数据库版本。

trans-unit.source: The geoip_db_avail() function returns if the corresponding GeoIP Database is available and can be opened on disk.

trans-unit.source: The geoip_db_filename() function returns the filename of the corresponding GeoIP Database.

trans-unit.source: The geoip_db_get_all_info() function will return detailed information as a multi-dimensional array about all the GeoIP database types.
trans-unit.target: 所述geoip_db_get_all_info（）函数将返回的详细信息作为多维数组有关所有GeoIP的数据库类型。

trans-unit.source: The geoip_domain_by_name() function will return the second level domain names associated with a hostname or an IP address.

trans-unit.target: 所述geoip_netspeedcell_by_name（）函数将返回对应于主机名或IP地址的互联网连接类型和速度。

trans-unit.source: The geoip_record_by_name() function will return the record information corresponding to a hostname or an IP address.

trans-unit.source: The geoip_setup_custom_directory() function will change the default directory of the GeoIP database. This is equivalent to changing geoip.custom_directory.
trans-unit.target: 该geoip_setup_custom_directory（）函数将改变的GeoIP数据库的默认目录。这等效于更改geoip.custom_directory。

trans-unit.target: 该geoip_time_zone_by_country_and_region（）函数将返回相应于一个国家和地区代码组合的时区。

trans-unit.source: The getimagesize() function will determine the size of any supported given image file and return the dimensions along with the file type and a height/width text string to be used inside a normal
trans-unit.target: 的和getimagesize（）函数将确定任何支持的给定的图像文件的大小，并返回的尺寸与该文件类型和沿高度/宽度文本串内的正常使用

trans-unit.source: The glob() function searches for all the pathnames matching pattern according to the rules used by the libc glob() function, which is similar to the rules used by common shells.
trans-unit.target: 的水珠（）函数搜索匹配所有路径名 pattern 根据由所述的libc水珠（）函数，其类似于由普通壳使用的规则使用的规则。

trans-unit.source: The image_type_to_mime_type() function will determine the Mime-Type for an IMAGETYPE constant.
trans-unit.target: 所述image_type_to_mime_type（）函数将确定MIME类型用于IMAGETYPE恒定。

trans-unit.source: The key() function simply returns the key of the array element that's currently being pointed to by the internal pointer. It does not move the pointer in any way. If the internal pointer points beyond the end of the elements list or the array is empty, key() returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 的键（）函数返回，因此目前正由内部指针指向的数组元素的键。它不会以任何方式移动指针。如果内部指针指向元素列表的末尾或数组为空，则key（）返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The localtime() function returns an array identical to that of the structure returned by the C function call.
trans-unit.target: 的本地时间（）函数返回的阵列相同，该结构的返回由C函数调用。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_data_seek() function seeks to an arbitrary result pointer specified by the offset in the result set.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_data_seek（）函数试图通过指定一个任意结果指针 offset 的结果集。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_fetch_lengths() function returns an array containing the lengths of every column of the current row within the result set.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_fetch_lengths（）函数返回一个包含结果集内的当前行的每一列的长度的阵列。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_fetch_object() will return the current row result set as an object where the attributes of the object represent the names of the fields found within the result set.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_fetch_object（）将返回当前行的结果集作为对象，其中对象的属性表示所述结果集合内找到的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_get_cache_stats() was added as stub.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_get_cache_stats（）的溶液中加入作为存根。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_get_cache_stats() was removed.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_get_cache_stats（）除去。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_get_server_version() function returns the version of the server connected to (represented by the link parameter) as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_get_server_version（）函数返回连接到所述服务器（由表示的版本 link 参数）为整数。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_info() function returns a string providing information about the last query executed. The nature of this string is provided below:
trans-unit.target: 该mysqli_info（）函数返回一个字符串，提供有关执行的最后一个查询信息。下面提供了此字符串的性质：

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_insert_id() function returns the ID generated by a query (usually INSERT) on a table with a column having the AUTO_INCREMENT attribute. If no INSERT or UPDATE statements were sent via this connection, or if the modified table does not have a column with the AUTO_INCREMENT attribute, this function will return zero.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_insert_id（）函数返回一个表由查询（通常INSERT）生成的ID与具有AUTO_INCREMENT属性的列。如果没有通过此连接发送任何INSERT或UPDATE语句，或者如果修改后的表没有具有AUTO_INCREMENT属性的列，则此函数将返回零。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_thread_id() function returns the thread ID for the current connection which can then be killed using the mysqli_kill() function. If the connection is lost and you reconnect with mysqli_ping(), the thread ID will be other. Therefore you should get the thread ID only when you need it.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_thread_id（）函数返回，然后可以使用该被杀死当前连接的线程ID mysqli_kill（）函数。如果连接断开，而您重新连接mysqli_ping（），则线程ID将为other。因此，仅在需要时才应获取线程ID。

trans-unit.source: The mysqli_use_result() function does not transfer the entire result set from the database and hence cannot be used functions such as mysqli_data_seek() to move to a particular row within the set. To use this functionality, the result set must be stored using mysqli_store_result(). One should not use mysqli_use_result() if a lot of processing on the client side is performed, since this will tie up the server and prevent other threads from updating any tables from which the data is being fetched.
trans-unit.target: 所述mysqli_use_result（）函数不传输从数据库整个结果集，并因此不能被使用的功能，例如mysqli_data_seek（）移动到集合中的特定行。要使用此功能，必须使用mysqli_store_result（）存储结果集。如果在客户端执行了许多处理，则不应使用mysqli_use_result（），因为这将占用服务器并阻止其他线程更新从中获取数据的任何表。

trans-unit.source: The passthru() function is similar to the exec() function in that it executes a command. This function should be used in place of exec() or system() when the output from the Unix command is binary data which needs to be passed directly back to the browser. A common use for this is to execute something like the pbmplus utilities that can output an image stream directly. By setting the Content-type to image/gif and then calling a pbmplus program to output a gif, you can create PHP scripts that output images directly.
trans-unit.target: 的通路（）函数是类似于EXEC（） ，它执行的功能 command 。当Unix命令的输出是二进制数据且需要直接传递回浏览器时，应使用此函数代替exec（）或system（）。这样做的常见用途是执行类似pbmplus实用程序的程序，该程序可以直接输出图像流。通过将Content-type设置为image / gif，然后调用pbmplus程序输出gif，可以创建直接输出图像的PHP脚本。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_fork() function creates a child process that differs from the parent process only in its PID and PPID. Please see your system's fork(2) man page for specific details as to how fork works on your system.
trans-unit.target: 所述pcntl_fork（）函数创建了一个子进程，从仅在它的PID和PPID父进程不同。请参阅系统的fork（2）手册页，以获取有关fork在系统上的工作方式的特定详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_signal() function installs a new signal handler or replaces the current signal handler for the signal indicated by signo.
trans-unit.target: 所述pcntl_signal（）函数安装一个新的信号处理程序或替换由所指示的信号的当前信号处理程序 signo 。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_signal_dispatch() function calls the signal handlers installed by pcntl_signal() for each pending signal.
trans-unit.target: 所述pcntl_signal_dispatch（）函数调用由安装在信号处理程序（）pcntl_signal对于每个待处理的信号。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_signal_get_handler() function will get the current handler for the specified signo.
trans-unit.target: 该pcntl_signal_get_handler（）函数将获取指定当前处理器 signo 。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_sigprocmask() function adds, removes or sets blocked signals, depending on the how parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述pcntl_sigprocmask（）函数添加，删除或套阻塞信号，这取决于 how 参数。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_sigtimedwait() function operates in exactly the same way as pcntl_sigwaitinfo() except that it takes two additional parameters, seconds and nanoseconds, which enable an upper bound to be placed on the time for which the script is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 所述pcntl_sigtimedwait（）函数工作在完全相同的方式为相同pcntl_sigwaitinfo（）不同之处在于它需要两个额外的参数， seconds 和 nanoseconds ，这使一个上界被放置在用于该脚本的暂停时间。

trans-unit.source: The pcntl_sigwaitinfo() function suspends execution of the calling script until one of the signals given in set are delivered. If one of the signal is already pending (e.g. blocked by pcntl_sigprocmask()), pcntl_sigwaitinfo() will return immediately.
trans-unit.target: 该pcntl_sigwaitinfo（）调用脚本的功能挂起执行，直至中给出的信号的一个 set 交付。如果信号之一已经挂起（例如，被pcntl_sigprocmask（）阻止），则pcntl_sigwaitinfo（）将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The property_exists() function cannot detect properties that are magically accessible using the __get magic method.
trans-unit.target: 所述property_exists（）函数无法检测是神奇访问使用特性__get魔术方法。

trans-unit.source: The runkit_lint() function performs a syntax (lint) check on the specified php code testing for scripting errors. This is similar to using php -l from the command line except runkit_lint() accepts actual code rather than a filename.
trans-unit.target: 所述runkit_lint（）函数执行对脚本错误指定的PHP代码测试语法（皮棉）检查。这类似于从命令行使用php -l，不同之处在于runkit_lint（）接受实际代码而不是文件名。

trans-unit.source: The runkit_lint_file() function performs a syntax (lint) check on the specified filename testing for scripting errors. This is similar to using php -l from the commandline.
trans-unit.target: 所述runkit_lint_file（）函数执行对指定的文件名测试对于脚本错误语法（皮棉）检查。这类似于从命令行使用php -l。

trans-unit.source: The session_unset() function frees all session variables currently registered.
trans-unit.target: 该session_unset（）函数将释放所有会话变量注册。

trans-unit.source: The set_time_limit() function and the configuration directive max_execution_time only affect the execution time of the script itself. Any time spent on activity that happens outside the execution of the script such as system calls using system(), stream operations, database queries, etc. is not included when determining the maximum time that the script has been running. This is not true on Windows where the measured time is real.
trans-unit.target: 该set_time_limit（）函数的功能和配置指令的max_execution_time只影响脚本本身的执行时间。确定脚本已运行的最长时间时，不包括执行脚本之外发生的活动上的任何时间，例如使用system（）进行系统调用，流操作，数据库查询等。在测量的时间是真实的Windows上不是这样。

trans-unit.source: The socket_get_option() function retrieves the value for the option specified by the optname parameter for the specified socket.
trans-unit.target: 所述socket_get_option（）函数检索用于由所指定的选项的值 optname 指定参数 socket 。

trans-unit.source: The socket_recv() function receives len bytes of data in buf from socket. socket_recv() can be used to gather data from connected sockets. Additionally, one or more flags can be specified to modify the behaviour of the function.
trans-unit.target: 所述socket_recv（）函数接收 len 中的数据的字节 buf 从 socket 。socket_recv（）可用于从连接的套接字中收集数据。此外，可以指定一个或多个标志来修改功能的行为。

trans-unit.source: The socket_recvfrom() function receives len bytes of data in buf from name on port port (if the socket is not of type AF_UNIX) using socket. socket_recvfrom() can be used to gather data from both connected and unconnected sockets. Additionally, one or more flags can be specified to modify the behaviour of the function.
trans-unit.target: 所述socket_recvfrom（）函数接收 len 数据字节中 buf 从 name 端口 port （如果套接字类型的不 AF_UNIX 使用） socket 。socket_recvfrom（）可用于从已连接和未连接的套接字收集数据。此外，可以指定一个或多个标志来修改功能的行为。

trans-unit.source: The socket_set_block() function removes the O_NONBLOCK flag on the socket specified by the socket parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述socket_set_block（）函数将删除 O_NONBLOCK 由指定的套接字上标志 socket 参数。

trans-unit.source: The socket_set_nonblock() function sets the O_NONBLOCK flag on the socket specified by the socket parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述socket_set_nonblock（）函数设置 O_NONBLOCK 由指定的套接字上标志 socket 参数。

trans-unit.source: The socket_set_option() function sets the option specified by the optname parameter, at the specified protocol level, to the value pointed to by the optval parameter for the socket.
trans-unit.target: 所述socket_set_option（）函数设置由指定的选项 optname 参数，在指定的协议 level ，该值由所述指向 optval 的用于参数 socket 。

trans-unit.source: The socket_shutdown() function allows you to stop incoming, outgoing or all data (the default) from being sent through the socket
trans-unit.target: 使用socket_shutdown（）函数可以阻止传入，传出或所有数据（默认）通过 socket 发送

trans-unit.source: The stream_select() function accepts arrays of streams and waits for them to change status. Its operation is equivalent to that of the socket_select() function except in that it acts on streams.
trans-unit.target: 的stream_select（）函数接受流的阵列，并等待他们改变状态。它的作用与socket_select（）函数的作用相同，除了它作用于流上。

trans-unit.source: The system() call also tries to automatically flush the web server's output buffer after each line of output if PHP is running as a server module.
trans-unit.target: 该系统（）调用也尝试如果PHP运行作为服务器模块来自动冲洗web服务器的输出缓冲器输出的每一行之后。

trans-unit.source: The $http_response_headerarray is similar to the get_headers() function. When using the HTTP wrapper, $http_response_header will be populated with the HTTP response headers. $http_response_header will be created in the local scope.
trans-unit.target: 的 $http_response_header 阵列类似于get_headers（）函数。使用HTTP包装器时， $http_response_header 将使用HTTP响应标头填充。 $http_response_header 将在本地范围内创建。

trans-unit.source: The <var><var>$name</var></var> argument is the name of the method being called. The <var><var>$arguments</var></var> argument is an enumerated array containing the parameters passed to the <var><var>$name</var></var>'ed method.
trans-unit.target: 在 <var><var>$name</var></var> 参数是被调用的方法的名称。的 <var><var>$arguments</var></var> 参数是一个包含传递给所述参数枚举数组 <var><var>$name</var></var> “编方法。

trans-unit.source: The $name argument is the name of the property being interacted with. The __set() method's $value argument specifies the value the $name'ed property should be set to.
trans-unit.target: 在 $name 参数是被互动与属性的名称。该__set（）方法的 $value 参数指定的值 $name “编辑属性应该设置为。

trans-unit.source: The $size wasn't overwritten because we specified EXTR_PREFIX_SAME, which resulted in $wddx_size being created. If EXTR_SKIP was specified, then $wddx_size wouldn't even have been created. EXTR_OVERWRITE would have caused $size to have value "medium", and EXTR_PREFIX_ALL would result in new variables being named $wddx_color, $wddx_size, and $wddx_shape.
trans-unit.target: 在 $size ，因为我们规定没有被覆盖 EXTR_PREFIX_SAME ，导致 $wddx_size 创建。如果指定了 EXTR_SKIP ，则甚至不会创建 $wddx_size 。 EXTR_OVERWRITE 会导致 $size 值为“ medium”，而 EXTR_PREFIX_ALL 将导致新变量名为 $wddx_color ， $wddx_size 和 $wddx_shape 。

trans-unit.source: The Alternate attribute is used to control the handling of the so called variable characters in the UCA: whitespace, punctuation and symbols. If Alternate is set to NonIgnorable (N), then differences among these characters are of the same importance as differences among letters. If Alternate is set to Shifted (S), then these characters are of only minor importance. The Shifted value is often used in combination with Strength set to Quaternary. In such a case, whitespace, punctuation, and symbols are considered when comparing strings, but only if all other aspects of the strings (base letters, accents, and case) are identical. If Alternate is not set to Shifted, then there is no difference between a Strength of 3 and a Strength of 4. For more information and examples, see Variable_Weighting in the » UCA. The reason the Alternate values are not simply On and Off is that additional Alternate values may be added in the future. The UCA option Blanked is expressed with Strength set to 3, and Alternate set to Shifted. The default for most locales is NonIgnorable. If Shifted is selected, it may be slower if there are many strings that are the same except for punctuation; sort key length will not be affected unless the strength level is also increased.
trans-unit.target: Alternate属性用于控制UCA中所谓的可变字符的处理：空格，标点和符号。如果将Alternate设置为NonIgnorable（N），则这些字符之间的差异与字母之间的差异具有相同的重要性。如果将“替代”设置为“已移位（S）”，则这些字符仅次要。所述移值通常与组合使用强度设置为第四纪。在这种情况下，只有在字符串的所有其他方面（基本字母，重音和大小写）都相同时，才在比较字符串时考虑空格，标点符号和符号。如果将Alternate未设置为Shifted，则强度3和强度4之间没有区别。有关更多信息和示例，请参见»UCA中的 Variable_Weighting 。 Alternate值不是简单地On和Off的原因是将来可能会添加其他替代值。 UCA选项“空白”表示“强度”设置为3，“替代”设置为“已移动”。大多数语言环境的默认值为NonIgnorable。如果选择了Shifted，则除了标点符号外，如果有很多相同的字符串，则速度可能会变慢。排序键的长度不会受到影响，除非同时提高强度级别。

trans-unit.source: The Case_First attribute is used to control whether uppercase letters come before lowercase letters or vice versa, in the absence of other differences in the strings. The possible values are Uppercase_First (U) and Lowercase_First (L), plus the standard Default and Off. There is almost no difference between the Off and Lowercase_First options in terms of results, so typically users will not use Lowercase_First: only Off or Uppercase_First. (People interested in the detailed differences between X and L should consult the Collation Customization). Specifying either L or U won't affect string comparison performance, but will affect the sort key length.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中不存在其他差异的情况下，Case_First属性用于控制大写字母是否在小写字母之前或反之亦然。可能的值是Uppercase_First（U）和Lowercase_First（L），加上标准的Default和Off。在结果方面，Off和Lowercase_First选项之间几乎没有区别，因此通常用户不会使用Lowercase_First：仅使用Off或Uppercase_First。 （对X和L之间的详细区别感兴趣的人们应该咨询Collat​​ion Customization）。指定L或U不会影响字符串比较性能，但会影响排序键的长度。

trans-unit.source: The Case_Level attribute is used when ignoring accents but not case. In such a situation, set Strength to be Primary, and Case_Level to be On. In most locales, this setting is Off by default. There is a small string comparison performance and sort key impact if this attribute is set to be On.
trans-unit.target: 当忽略重音但不区分大小写时，使用Case_Level属性。在这种情况下，将Strength设置为Primary，将Case_Level设置为On。在大多数语言环境中，默认情况下此设置为“关”。如果将此属性设置为On，则字符串比较性能和排序键影响较小。

trans-unit.source: The ICU Collation Service supports many levels of comparison (named "Levels", but also known as "Strengths"). Having these categories enables ICU to sort strings precisely according to local conventions. However, by allowing the levels to be selectively employed, searching for a string in text can be performed with various matching conditions. For more detailed information, see collator_set_strength() chapter.
trans-unit.target: ICU整理服务支持许多比较级别（称为“级别”，也称为“强度”）。拥有这些类别使ICU可以根据本地约定精确地对字符串进行排序。但是，通过允许有选择地使用级别，可以在各种匹配条件下执行文本中的字符串搜索。有关更多详细信息，请参见collat​​or_set_strength（）一章。

trans-unit.source: The IV is ignored in ECB mode as this mode does not require it. You will need to have the same IV (think: starting point) both at encryption and decryption stages, otherwise your encryption will fail.
trans-unit.target: 在ECB模式下,IV被忽略,因为这个模式不需要它。你需要在加密和解密阶段都有相同的IV(比如:起点),否则你的加密会失败。

trans-unit.source: The IV is only meant to give an alternative seed to the encryption routines. This IV does not need to be secret at all, though it can be desirable. You even can send it along with your ciphertext without losing security.
trans-unit.target: IV只是为了给加密例程提供一个替代种子。这个IV根本不需要是秘密的,尽管它可能是可取的。你甚至可以把它和你的密文一起发送,而不会失去安全性。

trans-unit.source: The IV should normally have the size of the algorithms block size, but you must obtain the size by calling mcrypt_enc_get_iv_size(). IV is ignored in ECB. IV MUST exist in CFB, CBC, STREAM, nOFB and OFB modes. It needs to be random and unique (but not secret). The same IV must be used for encryption/decryption. If you do not want to use it you should set it to zeros, but this is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: IV通常应具有算法块大小的大小，但是您必须通过调用mcrypt_enc_get_iv_size（）获得该大小。ECB中忽略IV。IV必须以CFB，CBC，STREAM，nOFB和OFB模式存在。它必须是随机且唯一的（但不是秘密的）。必须使用相同的IV进行加密/解密。如果您不想使用它，则应将其设置为零，但是不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: The Imagick class

trans-unit.source: The Imagick class has the ability to hold and operate on multiple images simultaneously. This is achieved through an internal stack. There is always an internal pointer that points at the current image. Some functions operate on all images in the Imagick class, but most operate only on the current image in the internal stack. As a convention, method names can contain the word Image to denote they affect only the current image in the stack.
trans-unit.target: Imagick类有能力同时持有和操作多个图像。这是通过一个内部堆栈实现的。始终有一个指向当前图像的内部指针。有些函数对Imagick类中的所有图像进行操作,但大多数函数只对内部栈中的当前图像进行操作。作为惯例,方法名可以包含 Image 一词来表示它们只影响堆栈中的当前图像。

trans-unit.source: The Levenshtein distance is defined as the minimal number of characters you have to replace, insert or delete to transform str1 into str2. The complexity of the algorithm is O(m*n), where n and m are the length of str1 and str2 (rather good when compared to similar_text(), which is O(max(n,m)**3), but still expensive).
trans-unit.target: Levenshtein距离定义为将 str1 转换为 str2 时必须替换，插入或删除的最小字符数。该算法的复杂度为O（m * n），其中n和m是 str1 和 str2 的长度（与like_text（）相比，很好，后者为O（max（n，m）** 3），但是还是很贵）。

trans-unit.target: LimitIterator类

trans-unit.source: The Locale attribute is typically the most important attribute for correct sorting and matching, according to the user expectations in different countries and regions. The default » UCA ordering will only sort a few languages such as Dutch and Portuguese correctly ("correctly" meaning according to the normal expectations for users of the languages). Otherwise, you need to supply the locale to UCA in order to properly collate text for a given language. Thus a locale needs to be supplied so as to choose a collator that is correctly tailored for that locale. The choice of a locale will automatically preset the values for all of the attributes to something that is reasonable for that locale. Thus most of the time the other attributes do not need to be explicitly set. In some cases, the choice of locale will make a difference in string comparison performance and/or sort key length.
trans-unit.target: 根据不同国家和地区的用户期望，“语言环境”属性通常是正确排序和匹配的最重要属性。默认值»UCA订购只会正确地对几种语言（如荷兰语和葡萄牙语）进行排序（“正确”的含义是根据对语言用户的正常期望）。否则，您需要将语言环境提供给UCA，以便正确整理给定语言的文本。因此，需要提供一个语言环境，以便选择针对该语言环境正确定制的整理程序。语言环境的选择将自动将所有属性的值预设为对该语言环境合理的值。因此，大多数时候不需要显式设置其他属性。在某些情况下，语言环境的选择会影响字符串比较性能和/或排序键的长度。

trans-unit.target: Locale类(和相关的程序函数)用于与locale标识符交互--验证一个ID是否格式良好、有效等。在 UAX #35 中 CLDR 所使用的扩展(并由 ICU 继承)是有效的,并且在 ICU 中通常会在任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: The Mersenne Twister implementation in PHP now uses a new seeding algorithm by Richard Wagner. Identical seeds no longer produce the same sequence of values they did in previous versions. This behavior is not expected to change again, but it is considered unsafe to rely upon it nonetheless.
trans-unit.target: Mersenne Twister 在 PHP 中的实现现在使用了 Richard Wagner 的新种子算法。相同的种子不再产生与之前版本相同的值序列。这种行为预计不会再有改变,但还是认为依赖它是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: The MessageFormatter class
trans-unit.target: MessageFormatter类

trans-unit.source: The MessageFormatter class assembles messages from various fragments (such as text fragments, numbers, and dates) supplied by the program. Because of the MessageFormatter class, the program does not need to know the order of the fragments. The class uses the formatting specifications for the fragments to assemble them into a message that is contained in a single string within a resource bundle. For example, MessageFormatter enables you to print the phrase "Finished printing x out of y files..." in a manner that still allows for flexibility in translation.
trans-unit.target: MessageFormatter类从程序提供的各种片段(如文本片段、数字和日期)中组合消息。由于MessageFormatter类的存在,程序不需要知道片段的顺序。该类使用碎片的格式化规范将它们组装成一个消息,该消息包含在资源包中的单个字符串中。例如,MessageFormatter使您能够打印 "Finished printing x out of y files..."这一短语,但仍允许灵活翻译。

trans-unit.source: The Normalization setting determines whether text is thoroughly normalized or not in comparison. Even if the setting is off (which is the default for many locales), text as represented in common usage will compare correctly (for details, see UTN #5). Only if the accent marks are in noncanonical order will there be a problem. If the setting is On, then the best results are guaranteed for all possible text input. There is a medium string comparison performance cost if this attribute is On, depending on the frequency of sequences that require normalization. There is no significant effect on sort key length. If the input text is known to be in NFD or NFKD normalization forms, there is no need to enable this Normalization option.
trans-unit.target: “规范化”设置确定文本在比较中是否被完全规范化。即使该设置为off（这是许多语言环境的默认设置），也可以正确比较常用用法中表示的文本（有关详细信息，请参阅UTN＃5）。仅当重音标记不规范时才会出现问题。如果设置为On，则可以保证所有可能的文本输入均获得最佳结果。如果此属性为On，则存在中等字符串比较性能成本，具体取决于需要标准化的序列的频率。对排序键的长度没有明显影响。如果已知输入文本采用NFD或NFKD规范化形式，则无需启用此Normalization选项。

trans-unit.source: The PharData class
trans-unit.target: PharData类

trans-unit.source: The PharData class provides a high-level interface to accessing and creating non-executable tar and zip archives. Because these archives do not contain a stub and cannot be executed by the phar extension, it is possible to create and manipulate regular zip and tar files using the PharData class even if phar.readonly php.ini setting is 1.
trans-unit.target: PharData类提供了用于访问和创建不可执行的tar和zip存档的高级接口。因为这些归档文件不包含存根并且不能由phar扩展执行，所以即使phar.readonly php.ini设置为1，也可以使用PharData类创建和操作常规zip和tar文件。

trans-unit.source: The PharException class
trans-unit.target: PharException类

trans-unit.source: The PharException class provides a phar-specific exception class for try/catch blocks.
trans-unit.target: PharException类为try/catch块提供了一个phar特有的异常类。

trans-unit.source: The PharFileInfo class
trans-unit.target: PharFileInfo类

trans-unit.source: The PharFileInfo class provides a high-level interface to the contents and attributes of a single file within a phar archive.
trans-unit.target: PharFileInfo类提供了一个高级接口,用于显示phar存档中单个文件的内容和属性。

trans-unit.source: The Query Phrase Slop is the amount of slop permitted on phrase queries explicitly included in the user's query string with the qf parameter.

trans-unit.source: The RNG file.
trans-unit.target: RNG文件。

trans-unit.source: The ROT13 encoding simply shifts every letter by 13 places in the alphabet while leaving non-alpha characters untouched. Encoding and decoding are done by the same function, passing an encoded string as argument will return the original version.
trans-unit.target: ROT13 编码只是将字母表中的每一个字母移位 13 位,而非阿尔法字符保持不变。编码和解码由同一个函数完成,传递一个编码字符串作为参数将返回原始版本。
